english.segment1: I close my eyes. And everything feels so right. Like a magic carpet ride. We fly away up high
english.segment2: And never come back down. We'll keep this peace we found. And you're always there
english.segment3: To love me when I'm feeling down. When no one else will come around. Every night you're always there. I need to know how much you care. You keep me hanging on and on. You keep me hanging on
english.segment4: The sun will rise. And I'll open up my eyes. But it all looks the same. As it did yesterday
